filesystem-recurseHelp: If true then the subfolders will also be searched for metadata
geonetwork-customCriteriaHelp: Define whatever criteria are supported by the remote node and not available in the predefined filters (eg. 'similarity' set to '1' for non fuzzy search). You may specify multiple criteria separated by ';' (eg. _schema;siteId with values iso19139;7fc45be3-9aba-4198-920c-b8737112d522)
rebuildIndexHelp: While rebuilding index, the search may return incomplete results and the CSW GetRecords operation is disabled. Use this function when catalog traffic is low. It's recommended to rebuild index after reloading index configuration or making changes directly in the database.
system/csw/metadataPublic-help: When a transaction inserts a new record via the CSW-T protocol, automatically publish the record to all users.
system/csw/transactionUpdateCreateXPath: Create element if it does not exist when using XPath in CSW transaction.
system/metadatacreate/generateUuid-help: GeoNetwork assigns a random metadata UUID to the metadata created by a user (default). To assign the metadata UUID manually disable this option and fill the metadata UUID prefix.
workspace-help: Namespace prefix and namespace URL corresponding to the workspace data has to be published in.
cookieWarning: This webpage uses cookies. Click below to accept and hide this message or change your cookie settings. See our privacy policy to find out more about how cookies are used on this site.
passwordMinlength: Password must contain at least 8 characters!
xsltToApply: Apply XSLT conversion. See Import Guidance for details.
editorBoardInfo: Create or import new records from this page. Quickly access and manage all metadata records.
searchOver: Welcome to the SpatialData.gov.scot Metadata Portal, Scotlandâ€™s catalogue of spatial data. Here you can find, share and reuse spatial data provided by Scottish public sector organisations. You can explore the data by INSPIRE theme, topic, organisation and geography. Read more about how to use this site in the online documentation. For more information email us at SSDI.Metadata@gov.scot. This site respects your privacy. See our privacy policy to find out more about how we process, handle and protect your personal information while browsing or using this website.
Unable_to_connect_to_service: Couldn't find a download service associated with this layer
wfsGetCapabilitiesFailed: Parsing of WFS GetCapabilities failed. Either there is no download service configured, or a problem with the service
errorRemoteServer: Error trying to reach the remote server:
whitespaceLayerName: Some layers have whitespaces in the name and may not be displayed properly. Detected this error in layer
layersWithWhiteSpaces: Some layers on this map contains white spaces on their name and will not appear on the printed pdf.
xml_gemini22gemini23-schemaupgrade: Batch convert from Gemini 2.2 to Gemini 2.3
